data.title: Rafe Kovich and Alison Barrington
data.meta_description: Rafe Kovich and Alison Barrington Kovich are a supercouple from the American soap opera Port Charles. Rafe was played by Brian Gaskill and Alison was played by Erin Hershey Presley. They were one of the most popular romantic pairings on the short-lived soap. The couple was not originally scripted into a romance. Once they were, they were written as star-crossed true loves with multiple obstacles to overcome. The couple is often referred by the portmanteau "Rali" on Internet message boards.
data.text: Rafe Kovich and Alison Barrington Kovich are a supercouple from the American soap opera Port Charles.[1] Rafe was played by Brian Gaskill and Alison was played by Erin Hershey Presley. They were one of the most popular romantic pairings on the short-lived soap.[2] The couple was not originally scripted into a romance. Once they were, they were written as star-crossed true loves with multiple obstacles to overcome.[3][4] The couple is often referred by the portmanteau "Rali" (for Rafe and Alison) on Internet message boards.
